title: Any Good Lucian Builds?
body: Recently, I've been playing Lucian mid as my 'pocket pick' as he is a high mobility marksman with a reasonable burst. Any good AD builds for Lucian?

replies.body:
If you are playing him mid, you probs will get more blue buffs from your jungler, making the {{item:3142}} + {{item:3071}} build work much better.
recommend build order:
{{item:3142}} ->{{item:1001}} ->{{item:3071}} ->{{item:3006}} ->{{item:1053}} ->{{item:3094}} ->{{item:3147}} /{{item:3036}} ->{{item:3072}}/{{item:3812}}

Masteries: Warlords, Fervor or Thunderlords are all good, depending on your pref really.

Get {{item:3142}} ->{{item:3071}} ->{{item:3147}} first if you are in hard carry mode

Core --> Black Cleaver, Youmuus, Lord Dominiks / Mortal Reminder, Rapid Firecannon, Situational Boots
Against AP --> Maw (Possibly rush it too)
Later: GA, Steraks, maybe even Frozen Mallet eh?

idk its something
You're intent feeding to get to bronze 5.
